briefdescription.para: Access service value saved with service attribute.

detaileddescription.para: This function access the service value parsed and saved previously in the user_data attribute field.

simplesect.para: Use it only on the attribute parsed in this module. To access service attribute use bt_gatt_dm_service_get function.
The service value from the parsed attribute or NULL when attribute UUID value is unexpected.

briefdescription.para: Access characteristic value saved with characteristic attribute.

detaileddescription.para: This function access the characteristic value parsed and saved previously in the user_data attribute field.

simplesect.para: Use it only on the attribute parsed in this module. To access characteristic attribute use bt_gatt_dm_char_next function.
The characteristic value from parser attribute or NULL when attribute UUID value is unexpected.

detaileddescription.para: Function returns connection object that is used by given discovery manager instance.

briefdescription.para: Get total number of attributes decoded.

detaileddescription.para: The number of attributes including the service attribute. It means that service without any attribute would return 1 here.
Function returns the value that contains UUID and attribute end handler of the service found.

parameterdescription.para: An attribute where start to search. If NULL - the first characteristic in the service would be found. Note: It can be the previous characteristic attribute or the last descriptor inside the previous attribute. Function would start searching for the next characteristic from that point.

simplesect.para: The pointer for an attribute that describes the characteristic or NULL if no more characteristic is present.

briefdescription.para: Get the characteristic by its UUID.

detaileddescription.para: Function finds characteristic attribute by the UUID stored in its characteristic value. If the selected characteristic is not found in parsed service it returns NULL.

simplesect.para: The characteristic attribute (the one with UUID set to BT_UUID_GATT_CHRC) with the selected UUID inside the characteristic value. Returns NULL if no such characteristic is present in the current service.

detaileddescription.para: Function returns any type of the attribute using its handle.

simplesect.para: The pointer to the attribute or NULL if there is no attribute with such a pointer.

detaileddescription.para: Function returns the attribute next to the given one. It returns any type of the attribute.

parameterdescription.para: Previous attribute or NULL if we wish to get first attribute (just after service).

simplesect.para: Attribute next to the prev or the first attribute if NULL is given.

memberdef.argsstring: (const struct bt_gatt_dm *dm, const struct bt_gatt_dm_attr *attr_chrc, const struct bt_uuid *uuid)
memberdef.name: bt_gatt_dm_desc_by_uuid

detaileddescription.para: Function searches for the descriptor with given UUID inside given characteristic.

parameterdescription.para: The characteristic attribute where to search
The UUID of the searched descriptor.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the attribute or NULL if the attribute cannot be found.

detaileddescription.para: Function returns next descriptor. The difference between this function and bt_gatt_dm_attr_next is that it returns NULL also when returned attribute appears to be next characteristic.

parameterdescription.para: Previous attribute. The characteristic if we wish to get first descriptor or previous descriptor. If NULL or pointer to service attribute is given the result is undefined.

simplesect.para: The pointer to the descriptor attribute or NULL if there is no more descriptors in the characteristic.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_conn *conn, const struct bt_uuid *svc_uuid, const struct bt_gatt_dm_cb *cb, void *context)
memberdef.name: bt_gatt_dm_start

detaileddescription.para: This function is asynchronous. Discovery results are passed through the supplied callback.

simplesect.para: Only one discovery procedure can be started simultaneously. To start another one, wait for the result of the previous procedure to finish and call bt_gatt_dm_data_release if it was successful.

parameterdescription.para: UUID of target service or NULL if any service should be discovered.
Context argument to be passed to callback functions.

simplesect.para: If svc_uuid is set to NULL, all services may be discovered. To process the next service, call bt_gatt_dm_continue.

parameterdescription.para: If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

detaileddescription.para: This function continues service discovery. Call it after the previous data was released by bt_gatt_dm_data_release.

parameterdescription.para: Context argument to be passed to callback functions.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Release data associated with service discovery.

detaileddescription.para: After calling this function, you cannot rely on the discovery data that was passed with the discovery completed callback (see bt_gatt_dm_cb).

parameterdescription.para: If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

detaileddescription.para: This function prints GATT attributes that belong to the discovered service.
